channel.title: Domain Swap on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Domain Swap on RD's Blog

item.title: Structure of the Regulatory Apparatus of a Calcium-Dependent Protein Kinase (CDPK): A Novel Mode of Calmodulin-Target Recognition
item.description: A 2006 JMB study presenting the crystal structure of Arabidopsis CDPK’s regulatory domain, revealing a domain-swapped dimer and an unexpected mechanism of calmodulin-like domain (CaM-LD) recognition, challenging classical calmodulin-target models.
